welcome_message_body: Welcome to Campo Grande, Brazil! Get ready to experience the city's unique blend of modern amenities and traditional charm, known for its vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and beautiful natural surroundings. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Campo Grande has to offer.

restaurants.name: Tokyo Dome
restaurants.description: Tokyo Dome is a pastelaria located in Campo Grande.
restaurants.address: R. 7 de Setembro, 65 (Box 28 e 30), Campo Grande, MS, 79002-121
